page.title: 10Chatteris Festival
page.content: The festival takes place annually and lasts for a week. There are a variety of activities. This year on Wednesday there was a{bed race}with ten entries including the swimming club, Cross Keys Hotel, Trustee Savings Bank and Gateway Building Society. The prize for best bed went to 'Cleopatra's chariot!' People lined the streets to watch and cheer the beds being pushed through the town. On Friday 8 teams took part in {'It's a Knockout.'}Money raised from a festival concert on the same day raised{Â£150}for the Campaign for Tackling Acquired Deafness. The money will be used to provide a library of environmental hearing aids such as flashing doorbells and alarm clocks. The finale on Saturday was a{fete and{procession of floats}including the 'Tower of London' which raised{Â£1000.
